mapper.update:
update t_receive_detail
third_id = #{thirdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
product_model = #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inventory_category = #{inventoryCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inventory_unit_price = #{inventoryUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
warehouse = #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
invoice_number = #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delivery_num = #{deliveryNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_receive_detail set third_id = #{thirdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, product_model = #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_category = #{inventoryCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_unit_price = #{inventoryUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, warehouse = #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, invoice_number = #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_num = #{deliveryNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delivery_company = #{deliveryCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_number = #{purchaseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error_msg = #{errorMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select upload_time, product_model, inventory_category, inventory_unit_price, warehouse, delivery_time, invoice_number, delivery_num, delivery_company, purchase_number, remark,id as error_id,error_msg as third_error_msg from t_receive_detail where record_id = #{recordId} and error_msg is not null
select b.* from t_deliver_receive_record a inner join t_receive_detail b on a.id = b.record_id where a.dealer_id = #{dealerId} order by a.create_time desc
select count(1) from t_receive_detail where record_id = #{recordId} and error_msg is not null
